mapper.select: SELECT r.*, p.name as position_name FROM resume r LEFT JOIN recruitment rec ON r.recruitment_id = rec.id LEFT JOIN position p ON rec.position_id = p.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume (recruitment_id, name, phone, email, education, experience, status, create_time) VALUES (#{recruitmentId}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{education}, #{experience}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM resume WHERE recruitment_id = #{recruitmentId}
